title: What to do if I am fasting & wake up with dry traces of gum bleed in my mouth? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: second question she says if i'm fasting and i wake up and there's uh my gum is bleeding and there are there are dry um traces of blood on my tongue or in my on my teeth in my mouth if you know that they exist you should not swallow that you should go and rinse your mouth and spit it out if you wake up unknowingly and you swallow any of it unintentionally your fasting is valid faison said
